feat.name: Alkenstar Agent Dedication
feat.prerequisites: trained in {@skill Deception} and at least one firearm
feat.access: You have been initiated by the grand duchess of Alkenstar or one of her agents.
entries: You put on the persona of a rough and tumble outlaw, but your real goals are to report threats to Alkenstar back to the grand duchess. You become an expert in {@skill Deception} and trained in your choice of {@skill Lore||Underworld Lore} or {@skill Lore||Legal Lore}; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the {@feat Lie to Me} skill feat.
special: You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the Alkenstar Agent archetype.

feat.name: Loose Cannon
entries: Your unpredictable gunfire often catches enemies off guard or hits unprotected areas. Make a ranged {@action Strike} with a firearm against a creature that you haven't already attacked on this turn. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage on this {@action Strike} equal to the number of weapon damage dice. The {@action Strike} gains the following failure effect.

Failure: The firearm misfires, but it doesn't cause the other critical failure effects listed below.
Critical Failure: The firearm misfires and also explodes.

It becomes {@condition broken}, and it deals its normal weapon damage to all creatures in a 20-foot burst centered on the firearm, with a basic Reflex save against your class DC. This damage includes any from the weapon's fundamental and property runes.

feat.name: Prepare Papers
feat.prerequisites: {@archetype Alkenstar Agent Dedication|OoA1}, master in {@skill Society}
entries: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can {@action Create Forgery||Create a Forgery} as an exploration activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in {@skill Society}.

feat.name: Flash Your Badge
feat.prerequisites: {@archetype Alkenstar Agent Dedication|OoA1}, master in {@skill Intimidation}
entries: You make a fearsome show of your authority. Roll {@skill Intimidation} checks to {@action Demoralize} each creature in a 30-foot cone. When you do so, {@action Demoralize} gains the {@trait visual} trait, and creatures are affected if they can see you. If a target creature hasn't broken a law in the past week (as determined by the GM), the result of your check against that creature is one degree of success worse than the result you rolled.

feat.name: Black Powder Flash
entries: You ignite a pinch of black powder in a foe's face. Choose an adjacent creature. It must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC.

Success: The creature is {@condition dazzled} for 1 round.
Failure: The creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 round and {@condition dazzled} for 1 minute. The creature can rub its eyes as an {@action Interact} action to end this {@condition blinded} condition.
Critical Failure: The creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 round and {@condition dazzled} for 1 hour.

feat.name: Inured to Alchemy
feat.access: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.
entries: You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs. Each of your successful saving throws against an alchemical poison, a drug, or an addiction reduces the stage by 2, or by 1 for a virulent alchemical poison, drug, or addiction. Each critical success reduces the stage by 3, or by 2 for a virulent alchemical poison, drug, or addiction.

feat.name: Pain Tolerance
feat.access: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.
entries: You gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you {@condition clumsy}, {@condition drained}, or {@condition enfeebled}.

feat.name: Powder Punch Stance
feat.access: You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.
entries: You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee {@action Strike} each round with an unarmed attack, {@item knuckle duster|G&G}, or {@item black powder knuckle dusters|G&G}, you deal an additional 1 fire damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to {@action Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

feat.name: Thunder Clap
entries: You slam your hands together to unleash a deafening blast. Creatures in a 15-foot cone take {@damage 3d6} sonic damage, with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC.

Creatures that critically fail their save are also {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. You can't use this ability again for {@dice 1d4} rounds as your hands recover from the thunderous vibrations. At 8th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage from Thunder Clap increases by {@dice 1d6}.
